attributes.action: Review History curriculum and teach next generations the truths of Colonialism
attributes.additional_details: It's crucial to gain a different historical perspective by understanding the horrors and atrocities committed by European colonies. Much of today's racism is derived from a lack of knowledge and understanding by the general public. Groups such as the English Defence League and Britain First instigate and spread hate towards minority groups. Minority groups whose countries were invaded, families and communities ripped apart, natural riches stolen all while destroying their history and traditions.
attributes.background: Review History curriculum in UK schools and teach next generations the truths and horrors of European Colonialism. It's important for next generations to truly understand how other continents were pillaged and divided between European colonies for monetary gain.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Add education on diversity and racism to all school curriculums: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323808

Making the UK education curriculum more inclusive of BAME history: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323961

Teach Britain's colonial past as part of the UK's compulsory curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324092

We have also published several petitions about race and equality more widely, which you can view here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=race-and-equality
